import AddToCartIcon from "../assets/cart1.svg" import { useState } from "react" const ListItem = ({ data }) => { const [message, setMessage] = useState("Not added to the cart yet") // let message = "Not added to the cart yet" const handleClick = () => { // message = "Added to the cart!" setMessage("Added to the Cart!") console.log("Clicked, ", message) } return (
₹{data.discountedPrice} ₹{data.price}

{data.title}

{message}
) } export default ListItem
